This lab will be focused on finishing your project proposal. [Click here](https://sta210-sp21.netlify.app/project/#project-proposal) to see the instructions for the proposal.

# Submission

You will submit the proposal by pushing your work to your project GitHub repo. The teaching team will provide feedback under the **Issues** on GitHub. 

You do **<u>not</u>** need to submit anything for the proposal on Gradescope.
